ygData.subject: Re: everquest dating for single gamers!
ygData.msgSnippet: I just read this whole message since I just passed it by before. I m not really interested in EQ dating since I m married and all. I was about to
ygData.messageBody:
I just read this whole message since I just
passed it by before. I'm not really interested in EQ
dating since I'm married and all. <br><br>I was about to
dismiss it again as your standard "come to my club" spam,
then I got to that last line.. Quoted Below.
<br><br>"and only thing is<br>this club does not
accept<br>swingers/mate swappings<br>or any other
alternative<br>lifestyle choice that some<br>make and so if your
into<br>any of those then please<br>step away from the
club!"<br><br>So, what... People who lead alternative lifestyles
don∩┐╜t date? Why exclude those with interesting
interests? It seems to me that your average EQ player
already has some unique interests. Your probably
excluding a large number of players by only welcoming
people you consider ∩┐╜Normal∩┐╜. <br><br>Why stop there?
Why not exclude smokers. And fat people. And people
with red hair. Oh, and who would want to date a
paraplegic. In fact, let∩┐╜s not let any cripples in. Just fine
normal breeding stock, from a good family. <br><br>Oh
well. Have fun in your club.<br><br>Sorry for the rant
but this kind of bigotry hit∩┐╜s too close to
home.<br><br>Zen
